Question: PEEL Lab CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
PEEL Lab CES 2024

Product: PEEL&Play

- PEEL&Play is a semi-active SMART sensory toy with interlocking pieces designed to address self-stimulatory behaviors in children with autism spectrum disorder and monitor developmental progress through play therapy.
- The hardware has a therapeutic effect of 56.3% immediate reduction in stimming behavior, while the AI-based software analyzes developmental progress through various data-driven parameters.
- The toy is intended to help children with autism spectrum disorder and related disabilities, providing a personalized and therapeutic play experience.
